title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Cook pancetta until crisp. Combine spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture. Season with salt and pepper.
author: Chef John

title: Vegetarian Tacos
instructions: Warm tortillas. Combine black beans, corn, diced avocado, chopped onion, and cilantro. Squeeze lime over the mixture. Fill tortillas with mixture.
author: Chef Maria

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and curry powder, cook until chicken is browned. Add tomatoes and coconut milk, simmer until chicken is cooked. Garnish with cilantro.
author: Chef Anjali

title: Gluten-Free Brownies
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add melted butter, eggs, and vanilla. Pour into a baking pan. Bake at 350°F for 25 minutes.
author: Chef Emma

title: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook beef in butter until browned. Add mushrooms and onion. Stir in flour, broth, and mustard. Simmer until thickened. Add sour cream. Serve over noodles.
author: Chef Alex

title: Vegan Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa. Mix with chopped tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and avocado. Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil. Season with salt and pepper.
author: Chef Sophia

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add milk and eggs, stir until smooth. Melt butter in pan, pour batter, cook until bubbles form. Flip and cook until golden.
author: Chef James

title: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables. Mix with feta and olives. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Season with oregano, salt, and pepper.
author: Chef Nikos

title: Sushi Rolls
instructions: Cook sushi rice. Lay nori on mat, spread rice, add vegetables. Roll tightly. Slice and serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and ginger.
author: Chef Aiko

title: Lamb Kebabs
instructions: Marinate lamb in yogurt and spices. Skewer and grill until cooked through.
author: Chef Youssef

title: Mango Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
author: Chef Lisa

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Cook beef with onion and garlic. Mix with rice and tomato sauce. Stuff peppers with mixture. Top with cheese and bake until peppers are tender.
author: Chef Carlos

title: Baked Salmon
instructions: Season salmon with lemon, garlic, dill, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Bake at 400°F for 20 minutes.
author: Chef Anna

title: Apple Pie
instructions: Peel and slice apples. Mix with sugar, flour, and cinnamon. Fill pie crust with mixture, top with butter and second crust. Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.
author: Chef Emily

title: Tofu Stir-Fry
instructions: Cook tofu until golden. Add vegetables, ginger, and garlic. Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil. Serve over rice.
author: Chef Ming

title: French Onion Soup
instructions: Caramelize onions in butter. Stir in flour, then add broth, wine, thyme, and bay leaf. Simmer until thickened. Serve topped with cheese-topped baguette slices.
author: Chef Marie

title: Pad Thai
instructions: Cook noodles. Sauté shrimp, tofu, and garlic. Add eggs and scramble. Stir in noodles, sauce, bean sprouts, and peanuts. Serve with lime wedges.
author: Chef Somchai

title: Falafel
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Form into balls and fry until golden brown.
author: Chef Leila

title: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Blend basil, pine nuts, garlic, and cheese with olive oil. Toss pasta with pesto.
author: Chef Luca

title: Tom Yum Soup
instructions: Boil lemongrass, lime leaves, and galangal in water. Add mushrooms and shrimp. Season with fish sauce and lime juice. Garnish with cilantro and chilies.
author: Chef Pranee

title: Banana Bread
instructions: Mash bananas. Mix with sugar, butter, eggs, and vanilla. Add flour, baking soda, and salt. Pour into a loaf pan. Bake at 350°F for 60 minutes.
author: Chef Sarah

title: Ratatouille
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Add diced vegetables and thyme. Cook until tender. Season with salt and pepper.
author: Chef Antoine

title: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook shrimp in butter and garlic. Add wine and lemon juice. Toss with cooked spaghetti and parsley.
author: Chef Marco

title: Clam Chowder
instructions: Cook bacon until crisp. Sauté onion and celery in bacon fat. Add flour, then milk, cream, and thyme. Stir in clams and potatoes. Simmer until thickened.
author: Chef Gordon

title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange with basil. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Season with salt and pepper.
author: Chef Isabella

title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook chicken and garlic in butter. Add cream and parmesan. Toss with cooked fettuccine.
author: Chef Matteo

title: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Bread and fry eggplant slices. Layer with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and parmesan. Bake until bubbly.
author: Chef Lorenzo

title: BBQ Ribs
instructions: Rub ribs with spices. Slow cook in oven. Brush with bbq sauce and grill until caramelized.
author: Chef Tom

title: Spring Rolls
instructions: Soak rice paper. Fill with shrimp, vermicelli, lettuce, herbs, and carrot. Roll tightly. Serve with peanut sauce.
author: Chef Linh

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Serve in tortillas with lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.
author: Chef Pedro

title: Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté vegetables and garlic in olive oil. Add lentils, broth, tomato, and herbs. Simmer until lentils are tender.
author: Chef Maria

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread and fill with cheese. Grill until golden brown.
author: Chef James

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Cook chicken and slice. Toss with lettuce, cheese, croutons, and dressing.
author: Chef Emily

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients and chocolate chips. Drop dough onto baking sheet and bake at 350°F for 10 minutes.
author: Chef Olivia

title: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Sauté vegetables and garlic in olive oil. Add broth, beans, pasta, and herbs. Simmer until vegetables and pasta are tender.
author: Chef Giulia

title: BBQ Chicken Pizza
instructions: Spread bbq sauce on dough. Top with cooked chicken, mozzarella, and onion. Bake until crust is golden. Garnish with cilantro.
author: Chef Alex

title: Fish Tacos
instructions: Cook fish and flake. Serve in tortillas with cabbage, lime, cilantro, avocado, sour cream, and salsa.
author: Chef Diego

title: Greek Salad
instructions: Mix diced vegetables with feta and olives. Toss with olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano.
author: Chef Nikos

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cook chicken and set aside. Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. Add spices and tomato. Stir in coconut milk and chicken. Simmer until thickened. Garnish with cilantro.
author: Chef Raj

title: Tiramisu
instructions: Dip ladyfingers in espresso. Layer with mascarpone mixture. Dust with cocoa powder. Chill before serving.
author: Chef Lucia

title: Paella
instructions: Sauté chicken, shrimp, and chorizo. Add garlic, onion, and bell pepper. Stir in rice and saffron. Add broth and simmer until rice is cooked. Mix in peas and tomatoes.
author: Chef Carlos

title: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook beef and set aside. Sauté mushrooms and onion in butter. Add flour and mustard. Stir in broth and simmer. Mix in sour cream and beef.
author: Chef Dmitri

title: Moussaka
instructions: Sauté beef with onion, garlic, and spices. Layer eggplant and beef mixture in a baking dish. Top with bechamel sauce and cheese. Bake until golden.
author: Chef Eleni

title: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Cook chicken with seasoning. Sauté peppers and onion. Serve with tortillas and lime.
author: Chef Miguel

title: Butter Chicken
instructions: Cook chicken with spices and set aside. Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in butter. Add tomato sauce and cream. Stir in chicken and simmer.
author: Chef Priya

title: Quiche Lorraine
instructions: Cook bacon and onion. Whisk eggs, cream, milk, and spices. Layer bacon, onion, and cheese in crust. Pour in egg mixture. Bake until set.
author: Chef Marie

title: Falafel
instructions: Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, and herbs. Add spices, flour, and baking powder. Shape into balls and fry until golden.
author: Chef Nadia

title: Beef Bourguignon
instructions: Brown beef and set aside. Cook bacon, onion, carrot, and mushrooms. Add garlic and flour. Stir in wine, broth, and herbs. Add beef and simmer until tender.
author: Chef Jean

title: Pad Thai
instructions: Cook noodles and set aside. Sauté shrimp and garlic. Add noodles, egg, sauces, and sugar. Mix in sprouts, peanuts, and green onion. Serve with lime.
author: Chef Somchai

title: Tuna Poke Bowl
instructions: Marinate tuna in soy sauce, sesame oil, and ginger. Serve over rice with avocado, cucumber, and green onion. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and lime juice.
author: Chef Keoni

name: Vegetable Curry
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add curry powder and cook for a minute. Add vegetables and coconut milk. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Brown beef and set aside. Sauté mushrooms and onions in butter. Add beef, flour, and beef broth. Simmer and stir in sour cream.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
instructions: Grill chicken and slice. Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing and parmesan cheese. Wrap chicken and lettuce mixture in tortillas.

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa and let it cool. Combine with chopped vegetables, feta cheese, olives, olive oil, and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
instructions: Sauté garlic in butter. Add shrimp, lemon juice, and seasonings. Cook until shrimp are pink and opaque. Garnish with parsley.

name: Stuffed Zucchini
instructions: Hollow out zucchini and set aside. Sauté ground turkey with onion and garlic. Mix with tomato sauce and fill zucchini. Top with cheese and bake.

name: BBQ Ribs
instructions: Season ribs with spices and bake. Brush with BBQ sauce and bake until tender and caramelized.

name: Vegan Burrito Bowl
instructions: Layer rice, beans, corn, and vegetables in a bowl. Top with avocado slices and cilantro. Squeeze lime juice over the top.

name: Pork Schnitzel
instructions: Dredge pork chops in flour, dip in egg, and coat with breadcrumbs. Fry until golden and serve with lemon wedges.

name: Sweet Potato Fries
instructions: Cut sweet potatoes into fries. Toss with olive oil and spices. Bake until crispy.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry bacon and garlic until crispy. Mix eggs and cheese, then toss with pasta and bacon.

name: Falafel
instructions: Blend chickpeas with spices, onion, and garlic. Form into balls and fry until golden.

name: Buffalo Cauliflower Wings
instructions: Coat cauliflower florets in a batter of flour and almond milk. Bake until crispy and toss in buffalo sauce.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add mushrooms and rice. Deglaze with wine, then gradually add broth while stirring. Finish with cheese and butter.

name: Thai Green Curry
instructions: Sauté curry paste in coconut milk. Add chicken and vegetables. Simmer until cooked. Garnish with basil.

name: Coconut Rice
instructions: Combine rice, coconut milk, and water. Cook according to rice cooker or stove instructions.

name: Apple Crisp
instructions: Toss apples with sugar and spices. Top with a mixture of oats, flour, and butter. Bake until topping is golden and apples are tender.

name: Butternut Squash Soup
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add butternut squash and broth. Simmer until squash is tender. Blend until smooth and season with nutmeg.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Bread and fry eggplant slices. Layer with marinara sauce and cheeses. Bake until bubbly and golden.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix ingredients to form a batter. Cook on a griddle until bubbles form. Flip and cook until golden brown.

name: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta and toss with pesto sauce, cheese, and pine nuts. Garnish with additional cheese and olive oil.

name: Tandoori Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill or bake until cooked through.

name: Chicken Enchiladas
instructions: Fill tortillas with cooked chicken and vegetables. Roll and place in a baking dish. Top with sauce and cheese. Bake until bubbly.

name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve immediately.

name: Stuffed Mushrooms
instructions: Mix cream cheese, parmesan, and garlic. Stuff mushrooms with mixture. Top with breadcrumbs and bake until golden.

name: Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: Sauté chicken and vegetables. Add rice and soy sauce. Push to one side of the pan and scramble egg. Mix everything together.

name: Clam Chowder
instructions: Sauté onions and celery. Add potatoes and clam juice. Cook until potatoes are tender. Stir in cream and clams. Season and serve.

name: Spinach Salad
instructions: Combine spinach with tomatoes, onion, and feta. Dress with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Bread and fry chicken breasts. Top with marinara sauce and cheeses. Bake until bubbly and golden.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Combine all vegetables and olives. Toss with feta, olive oil, and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.

name: Baked Salmon
instructions: Season salmon with lemon, garlic, dill, and olive oil. Bake until cooked through.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Sauté garlic and ginger in oil. Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender. Toss with soy sauce.

name: Cornbread
instructions: Mix dry ingredients and wet ingredients separately. Combine and pour into a baking dish. Bake until golden.

name: Pork Tacos
instructions: Cook pork with taco seasoning. Fill taco shells with pork and toppings.

name: Cinnamon Rolls
instructions: Prepare dough with flour, yeast, sugar, and butter. Roll out, spread with butter and cinnamon, and roll up. Slice and bake.

name: Chicken Shawarma
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices. Grill or bake until cooked through.

name: Pumpkin Pie
instructions: Mix pumpkin puree with spices, eggs, and cream. Pour into pie crust and bake until set.
